issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.18:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #4d841d.
issues.description: 1.69% lower

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.18:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #4d841d.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > p:nth-child(3) > span

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.18:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #4d841d.
issues.description: -1.69% each year

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.18:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #4d841d.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > p:nth-child(4) > span

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.36:1. Recommendation:  change background to #328736.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.36:1. Recommendation:  change background to #328736.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > button

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

relatedNodes.html: During the yr 2022: Costs changed by 11.58%, that is much more than the typical change each year for oranges during the 2022-2023 time frame. Compared to all item increase in the yr 2022 (8%), the change for oranges was greatly higher.

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.44:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0000ff, surrounding text: #000000)

relatedNodes.html: During the yr 2022: Costs changed by 11.58%, that is much more than the typical change each year for oranges during the 2022-2023 time frame. Compared to all item increase in the yr 2022 (8%), the change for oranges was greatly higher.

any.message: The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.44:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0000ff, surrounding text: #000000)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text
